      • environment

        public Map<String,Object> environment()
        Description copied from interface: PluginAcceptor
        Returns a map of implementation specific variables that can be referenced by the plugin. Those writing plugins should examine the details of the various PluginAcceptor implementations for the variables that they pass, as they may provide important information useful to the plugin itself.
        Specified by:
        environment in interface PluginAcceptor
